data.message: Since I do not get an answer on message and the reply from support is of no help, I'm forced to put my question here: I reported a problem on a page I manage and the answer is they will use the feedback for improvement!! I have a spammer on the page and I'm unable to delete all comments by this spammer!! How can I get help to have them deleted???

replies.message: Facebook is anyone looking at your page???

Hi Hilde. We’ve built many tools to help prevent and remove spam. When it comes to proactively moderating content published on your Page, we recommend that you set up filters to block certain words. Doing so will automatically mark as spam any comments that include these words. Learn more here: http://bit.ly/2bCBkgi . On top of this, you can report spam using the report links near most content types and features: http://bit.ly/2bCBLXV. -Kevin

I know all this, but my problem is that I cannot delete the spam comments now!! I have klicked on "delete comment" for many times but the comments stay! This is not acceptable because I should be able as an administrator to delete comments. Therefor my question to you to delete all comment from Irana Joso on the group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/953813711329030/
Why don't you block the person?
Suzanne Rice  I did. But I want to delete the comments and that doesn't work!
Very disappointing Facebook is not responding to my question!!!!!!!!!!!
